options: I must of finished my homework by now.

questions.answer: I must have finished my homework by now.

questions.question: What is the opposite of "generous"?
Identify the correctly punctuated sentence:
options: She went to the store and bought milk eggs and bread.
She went to the store and bought milk, eggs, and bread.
She went to the store, and bought milk eggs, and bread.
She went to the store and bought, milk, eggs and bread.
questions.answer: She went to the store and bought milk, eggs, and bread.
